text: we're announcing it's immediately
available for you a new service called
the AWS key management
service which is encryption and key
management and compliance made easy And
what this allows you to do is you can
you can encrypt in one click from the
AWS management console or you can choose
to do it programmatically through the
SDK we provide You have a central place
to create keys disable keys view all
those keys or set policies on
keys You have enforced and automated key
rotation So you actually are rotating
your keys and then you have visibility
into any accesses to those keys through
AWS cloud
trail The keys are used in HSMS They're
integrated with all of the key data
store services in in AWS is S3 and EBS
and RDS and Redshift And then it's built
as a
global highly available highly durable
solution And this really matters if you
think about it If you have an
application where you've got encrypted
data and the application has to decrypt
that data to be able to display whatever
the data is that you're trying to
present if you don't have a key
management service that's highly
available it will take your entire
application down So we're very excited
about this service Uh we think it will
give you a capability that solves a
problem that we've heard consistently
from customers with the two different
ways they've been trying to do key
management And it's available for you
today
